QuestData.Title: Hexecutioner
QuestData.Description:
It would appear that this is where the coven is training their new acolytes. Our efforts may be for naught if they continue to expand their numbers.
I cannot leave Lucille's side in this place, but you have already shown yourself a formidable combatant.
Cut them down.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa witches of the Heartsbane Coven in Upper Corlain.
QuestData.RewardText: The people of Drustvar will sleep more soundly with less witches in the world.
